title: President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site: Basic Information
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information             Basic Information           Physical Address           412 Division Street  Hope, AR 71801                 Directions         President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home NHS is located in Hope, Arkansas. Hope is 30 miles from Texarkana (TX, AR) and 110 miles from Little Rock. From I-30, take exit 30 and travel south on Hwy 278 (Hervey Street) for approximately 2 miles. The park is located on the corner of 2nd Street and S Hervey Street.  Directions Details           Weather           Temperatures in Southwest Arkansas/Northeast Texas can range from the mid-thirties in winter (Late December to mid-March/early April) and mid 75-110 degrees throughout the spring and summer (May-September/October).    See current weather conditons and forecast.         Fees & Passes     Entrance Fees:   Free - $0.00 Free          Visitor Centers                   President Clinton Birthplace Home NPS Photo        President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site is located in Hope, Arkansas.  Hope is 30 miles east of Texarkana (on the border of Texas and Arkansas) and 110 miles west of Little Rock, Arkansas, on Interstate 30. The site includes the Birthplace Home, a visitor center located in an adjacent historic  home, and the Virginia Clinton Kelley Memorial Garden.                      Centennial Photos   3 Photos  Photographs to be used for the Centennial Subject Site
